title: 2012학년도 봄학기 학사과정 학점인정시험 시행 공고(Undergraduate Course Waiver Exam for Spring Semester 2012)
content: 2012학년도 봄학기 학사과정 학점인정시험 시행 공고 1. 신청기간 2012. 2. 6(월) ～ 2. 8(수)까지 2. 신청방법 학점인정시험 납입고지서(학과/전공사무실 및 학적팀, 교내 우리은행 비치)를 교부 받아 수험료를 교내 우리은행에 납부한 후 영수증 및 학점인정시험 신청서를 학적팀에 제출 3. 시험기간 2012. 2. 9(목) ～ 2. 13(월) 【3일간】 4. 시험과목 2012학년도 봄학기 개설교과목으로 담당교수가 인정하는 교과목 (졸업연구, 개별연구, 세미나, 특강, 실험과목 등은 제외) 5. 수험료 ① 금액 : 과목당 20,000원 ② 납부장소 : 교내 우리은행 ③ 납부기간 : 2012. 2. 6(월) ～ 2. 8(수)까지 6. 합격기준 학점인정시험의 합격기준은 B-등급 (환산점수 : 78점)이상이어야 하며, 이 경우, 성적 등급은 학칙 제49조 제1항에 따라 부여함. 7. 시험시간 및 장소 : 교과목 담당교수와 학생이 협의하여 정함 8. 학점인정시험 관련 문의사항 : 학적팀 (☏ 2363 : 강상신) 2012. 2. 교 무 처 장 **************************************************** Undergraduate Course Waiver Exam for Spring Semester 2012 1. Application Period February 6 (Monday), 2012 ～ February 8 (Wednesday) 2. Application Procedure Fill out the Course Waiver Exam Payment Bill provided at Department/Division offices, the Academic Registrar’s Team, or Woori Bank on campus => Pay the bill at the Woori Bank => Submit the payment receipt along with the completed Application form to the Academic Registrar’s Team 3. Exam period February 9 (Thursday), 2012 ～ February 13 (Monday) 【 Three days 】 4. Exams available for any courses offered during the Spring Semester 2011 with the instructor’s approval (except B.S. Thesis Research, Individual Research, Seminar, Special Lectures, Lab courses) 5. Tuition ① Amount: 20,000 per course ② Payment place: Woori Bank on campus ③ Payment Period: February 6 (Monday), 2012 ～ February 8 (Wednesday) 6. Passing Criteria Students will receive a grade for the exam in accordance with Article 49, Section 1 of the KAIST Academic Regulation , and the students with a B-level grade or above (conversion score: 78 point or above ) will obtain credit s for (pass) the corresponding course. 7. Exam Period and Place: will be set after students consult with the corresponding course instructor 8. For further questions: the Registrar’s Team ( ☏ 2363: Mr. Sang Shin Kang ) February 2012 Dean of Academic Affairs
